sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO eka.mst_void_payment (mvp_payment_id, reg_spaj, mspo_policy_no, lku_id, msdp_number, mvp_pay_date, mvp_payment, input_date_uw, lus_id, mvp_no_acc, mvp_no_pre, mvp_no_voucher, flag, jn_revisi ) VALUES (#mvp_payment_id#, #reg_spaj#, #mspo_policy_no#, #lku_id#, #msdp_number#, #mvp_pay_date#, #mvp_payment#, #input_date_uw#, #lus_id#, #mvp_no_acc#, #mvp_no_pre#, #mvp_no_voucher#, #flag#, #jn_revisi# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,sub_id) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE, a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#, #sub_id# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,jenis) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#,#jenis# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE, a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,jenis) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#,#jenis# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,jenis) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#,#jenis# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj_pas (reg_id, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.msp_fire_id, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, a.lssp_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc# FROM eka.mst_pas_sms a WHERE a.msp_fire_id = #reg_id# AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj_pas (reg_id, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lus_id, msps_desc) SELECT a.msp_fire_id, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), a.lspd_id, a.lssp_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc# FROM eka.mst_pas_sms a WHERE a.reg_spaj = #reg_spaj# AND ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,sub_id) SELECT a.reg_spaj, #tgl_kirim#, a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#, #sub_id# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj

INSERT INTO eka.mst_powersave_ubah (mpu_print_date, mpu_print_reg, mpu_no_reg, reg_spaj, mpu_jenis, mpu_tgl_awal, mpu_awal, mpu_akhir, lus_id, mpu_input, mpu_note, mpu_confirm_date, mpu_mature_date, mpu_deposit, mpu_interest, mpu_print ) VALUES (#mpu_print_date:TIMESTAMP#, #mpu_print_reg:INTEGER#, UPPER (#mpu_no_reg:CHAR#), UPPER (#reg_spaj:CHAR#), #mpu_jenis:INTEGER#, #mpu_tgl_awal:TIMESTAMP#, #mpu_awal:DOUBLE#, #mpu_akhir:DOUBLE#, #lus_id:INTEGER#, #mpu_input:TIMESTAMP#, UPPER (#mpu_note:VARCHAR#), #mpu_confirm_date:TIMESTAMP#, #mpu_mature_date:TIMESTAMP#, #mpu_deposit:DOUBLE#, #mpu_interest:DOUBLE#, #mpu_print:INTEGER# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_pbp (premi_ke, reg_spaj, spaj_bayar, tgl_jttempo, flag_cair ) VALUES (#premi_ke:INTEGER#, UPPER (#reg_spaj:CHAR#), UPPER (#spaj_bayar:CHAR#), #tgl_jttempo:TIMESTAMP#, #flag_cair:INTEGER# )

INSERT INTO eka.tmp_yosep (lstb_id, reg_spaj, mspro_prod_date, mspro_prod_ke, upp_eva, upp_kontes, upp_lain) VALUES (#lstb_id#, #reg_spaj#, #mspro_prod_date#, #mspro_prod_ke#, #upp_eva#, #upp_kontes#, #upp_lain#)

INSERT INTO eka.mst_comm_rider (reg_spaj, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, msdb_det_ke, lsbs_id, lsdbs_number, level_id, flag_reward, msag_id, komisi, pajak, tgl_komisi, flag_bayar, nilai_kurs, tgl_proses, nama, no_account, lbn_id ) VALUES (UPPER (#reg_spaj:CHAR#), #msbi_tahun_ke:INTEGER#, #msbi_premi_ke:INTEGER#, #msdb_det_ke:INTEGER#, #lsbs_id:INTEGER#, #lsdbs_number:INTEGER#, #level_id:INTEGER#, #flag_reward:INTEGER#, UPPER (#msag_id:CHAR#), #komisi:DOUBLE#, #pajak:DOUBLE#, TRUNC(sysdate), #flag_bayar:INTEGER#, #nilai_kurs:INTEGER#, TRUNC(sysdate), UPPER (#nama:VARCHAR#), UPPER (#no_account:VARCHAR#), #lbn_id:INTEGER#)

INSERT INTO eka.mst_agency_bonus (reg_spaj, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, flag_jenis, lsabt_id, msag_id, nama, no_account, lbn_id, msco_comm, msco_tax, msco_date, msco_pay_date, msco_paid, msco_active, msco_no_pre, msco_jurnal, lus_id, msco_nilai_kurs, flag_upload ) VALUES (UPPER (#reg_spaj:CHAR#), #msbi_tahun_ke:INTEGER#, #msbi_premi_ke:INTEGER#, #flag_jenis:INTEGER#, #lsabt_id:INTEGER#, UPPER (#msag_id:CHAR#), UPPER (#nama:VARCHAR#), UPPER (#no_account:VARCHAR#), #lbn_id:INTEGER#, #msco_comm:DOUBLE#, #msco_tax:DOUBLE#, trunc(sysdate), #msco_pay_date:TIMESTAMP#, #msco_paid:INTEGER#, #msco_active:INTEGER#, UPPER (#msco_no_pre:VARCHAR#), #msco_jurnal:INTEGER#, #lus_id:INTEGER#, #msco_nilai_kurs:INTEGER#, #flag_upload:INTEGER# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_stamp_hist (mstm_kode, msth_ref_no, msth_jenis, msth_jumlah, msth_desc, msth_tgl_bayar, msth_tipe ) VALUES (#mstm_kode#, #msth_ref_no#, #msth_jenis#, #msth_jumlah#, #msth_desc#, (select mspo_date_print from eka.mst_policy where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#msth_ref_no#,'.'),11,' ')),1 )

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_REK_CLIENT ( LUS_ID , TGL_CHANGE , MRC_KUASA , TGL_SURAT , MRC_KURS , MRC_KOTA , REG_SPAJ , LSBP_ID , MRC_CABANG , MRC_NAMA , MRC_NO_AC , MRC_JENIS , MRC_JN_NASABAH ) values ( #lus_id:INTEGER# , #tgl_change:TIMESTAMP# , #mrc_kuasa:INTEGER# , #tgl_surat:TIMESTAMP# , #mrc_kurs:CHAR# , #mrc_kota:VARCHAR# , #reg_spaj:CHAR# , #lsbp_id:INTEGER# , #mrc_cabang:VARCHAR# , #mrc_nama:VARCHAR# , #mrc_no_ac:VARCHAR# , #mrc_jenis:INTEGER# , #mrc_jn_nasabah:INTEGER# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_simcard (msc_jenis, no_kartu, nama, tgl_akhir, mcl_id, reg_spaj, tgl_lahir, alamat, kota, kode_pos, tgl_proses, flag_print, flag_aktif, flag_roll, lus_id, polis, total_premi, kartu_ke, tgl_input, flag_nb, lca_id, lca_cabang, notes) SELECT #jenis#, #polis#, decode(instr(b.mcl_first,'QQ'),0,b.mcl_first,TRIM(SUBSTR(b.mcl_first, 0, INSTR(b.mcl_first,'QQ')-1))), d.mste_end_date, b.mcl_id, a.reg_spaj, b.mspe_date_birth, e.msap_address, NVL (e.kota, g.lska_note), e.msap_zip_code, TRUNC (SYSDATE), #flag_print#, #flag_aktif#, 0, #lus_id#, #jumlahPolis#, #totalPremi#, 1, SYSDATE, 0, a.lca_id, f.lca_nama, #notes# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_client_new b, eka.mst_address_new c, eka.mst_insured d, eka.mst_address_billing e, eka.lst_cabang f, eka.lst_kabupaten g WHERE a.mspo_policy_holder = b.mcl_id AND b.mcl_id = c.mcl_id AND a.reg_spaj = d.reg_spaj AND a.reg_spaj = e.reg_spaj AND a.lca_id = f.lca_id AND e.lska_id = g.lska_id(+) AND a.reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

INSERT INTO eka.mst_rek_hist (reg_spaj, tgl, lus_id, notes, mrc_no_ac, mrc_no_ac_lama, jenis ) VALUES (#reg_spaj:CHAR#, sysdate, #lus_id:INTEGER#, #keterangan:VARCHAR#, #mrc_no_ac:VARCHAR#, #mrc_no_ac_lama:VARCHAR#, #typeRek:INTEGER# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_production (lstb_id, reg_spaj, mspro_prod_ke, mspro_prod_date, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, mspro_jn_prod, lku_id, mspro_nilai_kurs, mspro_beg_date, mspro_end_date, mspro_policy_cost, mspro_card_cost, mspro_stamp, mspro_jml_member, lca_id, lwk_id, lsrg_id, tgl_input, upp_eva, upp_kontes, upp_lain, com_eva, upp_bonus, ape_kontes, ape_eva, ape_prod) SELECT a.lstb_id, a.reg_spaj, (a.mspro_prod_ke + (select count(reg_spaj) from eka.mst_production where reg_spaj = a.reg_spaj)), #prodDate#, a.msbi_tahun_ke, a.msbi_premi_ke, 3 mspro_jn_prod, a.lku_id, a.mspro_nilai_kurs, a.mspro_beg_date, a.mspro_end_date, a.mspro_policy_cost, a.mspro_card_cost, a.mspro_stamp, a.mspro_jml_member, a.lca_id, a.lwk_id, a.lsrg_id, sysdate tgl_input, (-1*a.upp_eva), (-1*a.upp_kontes), (-1*a.upp_lain), (-1*a.com_eva), (-1*a.upp_bonus), (-1*a.ape_kontes), (-1*a.ape_eva), (-1*a.ape_prod) FROM eka.mst_production a, eka.mst_billing b WHERE a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = b.msbi_tahun_ke AND a.msbi_premi_ke = b.msbi_premi_ke AND a.lstb_id = 1 AND a.mspro_jn_prod = 1 AND b.msbi_nb = 1 AND a.reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')

INSERT INTO eka.mst_det_production ( lstb_id, reg_spaj, mspro_prod_ke, mspro_prod_date, lsbs_id, lsdbs_number, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, msdpr_premium, msdpr_discount, msdpr_tsi ) SELECT a.lstb_id, a.reg_spaj, (a.mspro_prod_ke + (select count(reg_spaj) from eka.mst_det_production where reg_spaj = a.reg_spaj and lsbs_id < 300)) prod_ke, #prodDate#, a.lsbs_id, a.lsdbs_number, a.msbi_tahun_ke, a.msbi_premi_ke, a.msdpr_premium, a.msdpr_discount, a.msdpr_tsi FROM eka.mst_det_production a, eka.mst_production b, eka.mst_billing c WHERE a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND a.reg_spaj = c.reg_spaj AND a.mspro_prod_ke = b.mspro_prod_ke AND a.mspro_prod_date = b.mspro_prod_date AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = b.msbi_tahun_ke AND a.msbi_premi_ke = b.msbi_premi_ke AND a.msbi_tahun_ke = c.msbi_tahun_ke AND a.msbi_premi_ke = c.msbi_premi_ke AND a.lstb_id = 1 AND b.mspro_jn_prod = 1 AND c.msbi_nb = 1 AND a.reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ') ORDER BY a.mspro_prod_ke

INSERT INTO eka.mst_csf_dial (reg_spaj, mscsf_dial_ke, flag_inout, mscsf_beg_tgl_dial, mscsf_end_tgl_dial, mscsf_tgl_back, mscsf_ket, lus_id, mscfl_no_ref, flag_finance ) VALUES (#spaj#, nvl((select max(mscsf_dial_ke)+1 from eka.mst_csf_dial where reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')), 1), #inout#, decode(#s_start#,null,sysdate,'',sysdate,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||' '||#s_start#,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss')), decode(#s_end#,null,sysdate,'',sysdate,to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||' '||#s_end#,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss')), to_date(#s_callback#,'dd/mm/yyyy'), #s_ket#, #lus_id#, #mscfl_no_ref#, #flag_finance# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_nilai (tahun, nilai, lus_id, create_date, reg_spaj, jenis, flag_proses, flag_fix, persen) VALUES (#tahun#, #nilai#, #lus_id:NUMBER#, sysdate, #reg_spaj#, #jenis#, #flag_proses#, #flag_fix#, #persen:NUMBER#)

INSERT INTO eka.mst_ulink_plat (reg_spaj, mu_ke, mtu_ke, mup_beg_lock, mup_end_lock, mup_jumlah, mup_unit, mup_saldo_unit ) VALUES (rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' '), #li_ke#, #li_mtu#, #ldt_nab#, #ldt_elock#, #ldec_jumlah#, #ld_unit#, #ld_saldo# )

insert into eka.mst_tag_payment (reg_spaj, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, mspa_payment_id, mstp_value, no_kttp) values ( #topup.reg_spaj#, #tahun#, #premi#, #topup.mspa_payment_id#, #topup.mspa_payment#, #topup.no_kttp# )

insert into eka.mst_payment( mspa_payment_id, lku_id, lsjb_id, client_bank, reg_spaj, mspa_no_rek, mspa_pay_date, mspa_due_date, mspa_date_book, mspa_payment, mspa_input_date, mspa_desc, lus_id, mspa_active, lsrek_id, mspa_nilai_kurs, mspa_old_policy, mspa_no_pre, mspa_flag_merchant ) values( #topup.mspa_payment_id#, #topup.lku_id#, #topup.lsjb_id#, #topup.client_bank#, replace(#topup.reg_spaj#,'.'), #topup.mspa_no_rek#, #topup.pay_date#, #topup.mspa_due_date:DATE#, #topup.mspa_date_book#, #topup.mspa_payment#, sysdate, #topup.mspa_desc#, #lus_id#, #topup.mspa_active#, nvl(#topup.lsrek_id#,0), #topup.mspa_nilai_kurs#, (case when #topup.lsjb_id#>=10 then #topup.mspa_old_policy:VARCHAR# else null end), #topup.mspa_no_pre#, #topup.mspa_flag_merchant# )
INSERT INTO eka.mst_batal ( reg_spaj, msb_no_batal, msb_tgl_batal, msb_alasan, lus_id ) VALUES ( replace(#spaj#,'.'), #sekuens#, SYSDATE, #alasan#, #lus_id# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_production (lstb_id, reg_spaj, mspro_prod_ke, mspro_prod_date, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, mspro_jn_prod, lku_id, mspro_nilai_kurs, mspro_beg_date, mspro_end_date, mspro_policy_cost, mspro_stamp, lca_id, lwk_id, lsrg_id,agent_1,agent_2,agent_3,agent_4,agent_5) SELECT a.lstb_id, a.reg_spaj, #prod_ke:NUMBER#, #prodDate:DATE#, #tahun:NUMBER#, #premi:NUMBER#, 1, a.lku_id, nvl(c.lkh_currency,1) lkh_currency, b.msbi_beg_date, b.msbi_end_date, b.msbi_policy_cost, b.msbi_stamp, b.lca_id, b.lwk_id, b.lsrg_id,#s_agent_1#, #s_agent_2#,#s_agent_3#,#s_agent_4#,#s_agent_5# FROM eka.mst_policy a, (SELECT * FROM eka.mst_billing WHERE msbi_tahun_ke = #tahun:NUMBER# AND msbi_premi_ke = #premi:NUMBER#) b, (select * from eka.lst_daily_currency where lkh_date = #rkDate:DATE#) c WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj:VARCHAR#,'.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj AND a.lku_id = c.lku_id(+)

INSERT INTO eka.mst_det_production (lstb_id, reg_spaj, mspro_prod_ke, mspro_prod_date, lsbs_id, lsdbs_number, msbi_tahun_ke, msbi_premi_ke, msdpr_premium, msdpr_discount, msdpr_tsi) SELECT lstb_id, reg_spaj, #prod_ke#, #prodDate#, #lsbs_id#, #lsdbs_number#, #tahun#, #premi#, #msdb_premium#, #msdpr_discount#, #mspr_tsi# FROM eka.mst_policy WHERE reg_spaj = RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' ')

INSERT INTO eka.mst_ulink_bill (reg_spaj, tahun, pot_ke, tgl_potong, usia_pp, usia_tt, total_premi, tgl_proses, flag_pot, tgl_prod, flag_jurnal, flag_bill, next_bill, lus_id, mu_ke ) VALUES (RPAD (replace(#spaj#,'.'), 11, ' '), #tahun#, #pot_ke#, SYSDATE, (SELECT mspo_age FROM eka.mst_policy WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')), (SELECT mste_age FROM eka.mst_insured WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')), #total_premi#, SYSDATE, #flag_pot#, #prodDate#, #flag_jurnal#, #flag_bill#, #nextDate#, #lus_id#, #muke# )

insert into eka.mst_diskon_perusahaan (MCL_ID, PERIODE, JENIS, REG_SPAJ, NOMINAL, LUS_ID, TAX_AMOUNT, TAHUN_KE, PREMI_KE, CREATE_DATE, PKHUSUS, PKASIH, PAKM) VALUES (#mcl_id_kud#, #periode_kud#, #jenis_kud#, replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'), #msco_comm_kud#, #lus_id#, #msco_tax_kud#, #msbi_tahun_ke#, #msbi_premi_ke#, #create_date_kud#, #pkhusus#, #pkasih#, #pakm#)
INSERT INTO eka.mst_deduct (msco_id, msdd_number, lsjd_id, msdd_date, msdd_deduct, msdd_tax, msdd_desc, lus_id ) VALUES (#co_id#, #msdd#, #lsjd#, TRUNC (SYSDATE), #ldec_sisa#, 0, #desc#, #lus_id# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_deduct (msco_id, msdd_number, lsjd_id, msdd_date, msdd_deduct, msdd_tax, msdd_desc, lus_id, lsbs_id, lsdbs_number, pot_upp, pot_biaya, pot_desc, pot_spaj ) VALUES (#msco_id#, (select count(*)+1 from eka.mst_deduct where msco_id=#msco_id#), #lsjd_id#, #msdd_date#, #msdd_deduct#, #msdd_tax#, #msdd_desc#, #lus_id#, #lsbs_id#, #lsdbs_number#, #pot_upp#, #pot_biaya#, #pot_desc#, #pot_spaj# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_comm_reff_bii (reg_spaj, tahun_ke, premi_ke, mcr_flag, tgl_komisi, kurs_id, jlh_premi, jlh_komisi, pajak_komisi, nilai_kurs, refund, mkt_allocation, jlh_insentif ) VALUES (replace(#no_spaj#,'.'), #tahun_ke#, #premi_ke#, #mcr_flag#, #ldt_prod#, #lku_id#, #ldec_premi#, #ldec_komisi#, #ldec_tax#, #ldec_kurs#, #refund#, #mkt_allocation#, #jlh_insentif# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_upload_refund (reg_spaj, tahun_ke, premi_ke, mcr_flag, tgl_refund, no_account, amount, jn_bank ) VALUES (REPLACE(REPLACE (#no_spaj#, '.'),'-'), #tahun_ke#, #premi_ke#, #mcr_flag#, #tgl_refund:TIMESTAMP#, REPLACE(REPLACE (#no_account#, '.'),'-'), #refund#, #jn_bank:NUMBER# )

insert into eka.mst_email (me_id, me_system, me_show_system, me_show_footer, me_from, me_from_alias, me_to, me_cc, me_bcc, me_subject, me_message, mec_id, me_html, me_status, me_status_message, me_count, me_lus_id, me_input_date, me_sent_date, me_reg_spaj, lje_id, priority) values( #me_id#, #me_system#, #me_show_system#, #me_show_footer#, #me_from#, #me_from_alias#, #me_to#, #me_cc#, #me_bcc#, #me_subject#, #me_message#, #mec_id#, #me_html#, #me_status#, #me_status_message#, #me_count#, #me_lus_id#, #me_input_date#, #me_sent_date#, #me_reg_spaj#,#lje_id#, 30 )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_simcard (msc_jenis, no_kartu, nama, tgl_akhir, mcl_id, reg_spaj, tgl_lahir, alamat, kota, kode_pos, tgl_proses, flag_print, flag_aktif, flag_roll, lus_id, polis, total_premi, kartu_ke, tgl_input, flag_nb, lca_id, lca_cabang, notes, tgl_naktif) SELECT #jenis#, #polis#, decode(instr(b.mcl_first,'QQ'),0,b.mcl_first,TRIM(SUBSTR(b.mcl_first, 0, INSTR(b.mcl_first,'QQ')-1))), d.mste_end_date, b.mcl_id, a.reg_spaj, b.mspe_date_birth, e.msap_address, NVL (e.kota, g.lska_note), e.msap_zip_code, TRUNC (SYSDATE), #flag_print#, #flag_aktif#, 0, #lus_id#, #jumlahPolis#, #totalPremi#, 1, SYSDATE, 0, a.lca_id, f.lca_nama, #notes#, #tgl_naktif# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_client_new b, eka.mst_address_new c, eka.mst_insured d, eka.mst_address_billing e, eka.lst_cabang f, eka.lst_kabupaten g WHERE a.mspo_policy_holder = b.mcl_id AND b.mcl_id = c.mcl_id AND a.reg_spaj = d.reg_spaj AND a.reg_spaj = e.reg_spaj AND a.lca_id = f.lca_id AND e.lska_id = g.lska_id(+) AND a.reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#spaj#,'.'),11,' ')
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_CANCEL ( REG_SPAJ, MSCAN_TGL_BATAL, MSCAN_SPAJ_BARU, LUS_ID) VALUES ( #kopi_spaj#, sysdate, #reg_spaj#, #lus_id#);

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc, sub_id, lspd_before, jenis) ( SELECT reg_spaj, (select sysdate from dual) msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, '' lssa_id, #lus_id# lus_id, upper(#msps_desc#) msps_desc, '' sub_id, '' lspd_before, '' jenis FROM eka.mst_policy WHERE reg_spaj = rpad(replace(#reg_spaj#,'.'),11,' ') AND ROWNUM = 1 )

insert into eka.mst_va(msv_id, create_date, user_create, jenis_va, jenis_syariah, jenis_link, msv_amount_req, start_no_va_req, end_no_va_req, start_no_va_cetak, end_no_va_cetak, lsbp_id) values(#msv_id#, sysdate, #user_create#, #jenis_va#, #jenis_syariah#, #jenis_link#, #msv_amount_req#, #start_no_va_req#, #end_no_va_req#, #start_no_va_cetak#, #end_no_va_cetak#, #j_bank#)

insert into eka.mst_det_va(no_va, msv_id, create_date, jenis_va, jenis_syariah, jenis_link, user_create, flag_active) values(#no_va#, #msv_id#, sysdate, #jenis_va#, #jenis_syariah#, #jenis_link#, #user_create#, #flag_active#)

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_VISA_CAMP ( REG_SPAJ, FLAG_NB, NAMA_PP, NO_HP, ALAMAT, KOTA, FLAG_CC, FLAG_SMED, KODE_AGENT, KODE_TM, TOTAL_PREMI, NILAI_VOUCHER, SISA_VOUCHER, USER_CS, TGL_INPUT, TGL_KIRIM, STS_KIRIM) ( select a.reg_spaj, #flag_nb#, c.mcl_first, b.no_hp, b.msap_address, b.kota, 0, #flag_med#, d.msag_id, null, eka.pacpolis.get_premi_total(a.reg_spaj), #nominal#, #nominal#, #lus_id#, sysdate, null, null from eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_address_billing b, eka.mst_client c, eka.mst_agent_prod d where a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj and a.mspo_policy_holder = c.mcl_id and a.reg_spaj = d.reg_spaj and d.lsle_id = 4 and a.reg_spaj = #spaj# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_position_spaj (reg_spaj, msps_date, lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, lus_id, msps_desc,sub_id_bas,lssa_id_bas) SELECT a.reg_spaj, SYSDATE, a.lspd_id, lssp_id, lssa_id, #lus_id#, #msps_desc#, #sub_id#, #lssa_id_bas# FROM eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b WHERE a.reg_spaj = RPAD (REPLACE (#reg_spaj#, '.'), 11, ' ') AND a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_PRINT_HISTORY (reg_spaj, print_date, print_desc, page_count, lus_id) VALUES ( #reg_spaj#, sysdate, #print_desc# , #page_count# , #lus_id#)
INSERT INTO EKA.OFAC_COMMENT (COMM_MOFS_ID, COMM_SPAJ, COMM_TYPE, COMM_COMMENT, COMM_TGL_INPUT, COMM_ADD_NUM, COMM_NAMA) VALUES (#mofs_id#, #spaj#, #type#, #comment#, sysdate, #add_num#, #nama#)
INSERT INTO eka.mst_trans_history ( reg_spaj, jenis, trans_ke, trans_ke2, $kolom_tgl$ , $kolom_user$ ) VALUES ( #reg_spaj#, 23, 1, 1, #tgl# , #lus_id# )
INSERT INTO EKA.LST_ULANGAN (reg_spaj, tanggal, jenis, lus_id, keterangan) VALUES ( #reg_spaj#, SYSDATE + (#addSecond# * (1/115200)), upper(#jenis#), #lus_id#, upper(#keterangan#))

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_TMSALES@EB ( tgl_sales, campaign, no_sertifikat, card_type, card_no, cust_no, holder_name, sex, bod_holder, age, mobile_no, product_code, premium, sum_insured, beg_date, end_date, bill_mode, bill_freq, tgl_input, flag_cek, posisi, status, application_id, email, no_akun, tipe_akun, id_customer, tgl_buka_akun, sts_nikah, kd_cabang, pekerjaan, tempat_lahir, address1, address2, home_phone, work_phone) VALUES (sysdate, #campaign#, #no_sertifikat#, #card_type#, #card_no#, #cust_no#, #holder_name#, #sex#, #bod_holder#, #age#, #mobile_no#, #product_code#, #premium#, #sum_insured#, #beg_date#, #end_date#, #bill_mode#, #bill_freq#, sysdate, #flag_cek#, #posisi#, #status#, #application_id#, #email#, #no_akun#, #tipe_akun#, #id_customer#, #tgl_buka_akun#, #sts_nikah#, #kd_cabang#, #pekerjaan#, #tempat_lahir#, #address1#, #address2#, #home_phone#, #work_phone#)

INSERT INTO EKA.MST_URL_SECURE ( id_secure_1, id_secure_2, id_encrypt_1, id_encrypt_2, key_id, link, create_date) VALUES (#id_secure_1#, #id_secure_2#, #id_encrypt_1#, #id_encrypt_2#, #key_id#, #link#, sysdate)

insert into eka.mst_speedy_history (key_id, row_num, input_date, description, lus_id) values (#spaj#, (select nvl(max(row_num),0)+1 from eka.mst_speedy_history where key_id = #spaj#), sysdate, upper(#keterangan#), #lus_id#)

insert into eka.mst_check_pn (mcpn_hp, mcpn_no_blanko, mcpn_nama_pemegang, mcpn_tgl_lahir_pp, mcpn_tgl_input, mcpn_flag_approve, mcpn_nama_pemegang_lama, mcpn_tgl_lahir_pp_lama,mcpn_flag_agen,mcpn_no_polis_sebelumnya) values ( #hp#, #no_blanko#, upper(#nama_pp#), to_date(#bdate#,'dd/MM/yyyy'), sysdate, 0, upper(#namaPpSebelumnya#), to_date(#tgl_lahir_pp_sebelumnya#,'dd/MM/yyyy'), #flag#, #no_polis# )

INSERT INTO eka.mst_refferal (reg_spaj, nama_pp, no_hp, email, alamat, kota_rumah, tgl_mulai_as, tgl_input_spaj, premi, paket, id_member, id_sponsor, id_place, tgl_hit) ( select a.reg_spaj, c.mcl_first nama_pp, d.no_hp, d.email, d.alamat_rumah, d.kota_rumah, b.mste_beg_date tgl_mulai_as, a.mspo_input_date tgl_input_spaj, e.mspr_premium premi, b.flag_packet, a.mspo_nasabah_dcif id_member, a.mspo_id_sponsor id_sponsor, a.mspo_id_place id_place, (case when a.mspo_nasabah_dcif is not null then sysdate else null end) tgl_hit from eka.mst_policy a, eka.mst_insured b, eka.mst_client_new c, eka.mst_address_new d, eka.mst_product_insured e where a.reg_spaj = b.reg_spaj and a.reg_spaj = e.reg_spaj and a.mspo_policy_holder = c.mcl_id and a.lstb_id = 1 and a.lca_id = '37' and a.lwk_id = 'M1' and b.mste_insured_no = e.mste_insured_no and c.mcl_id = d.mcl_id and e.lsbs_Id < 300 and a.reg_spaj = #value# )
INSERT INTO EKA.MST_EKSTERNAL_PRINT(REG_SPAJ,FLAG_KONFIRMASI,FOLDER,LCA_ID,TGL_GENERATE,LUS_ID) VALUES (#reg_spaj#,null,#path#,#lcaId#,sysdate,#lusId#)

insert into EKA.LST_HIST_ACTIVITY_WS_OUT (ID, CLIENT_ID, JENIS_ID, PROCESS_API, PROCESS_DESC, HTTP_STATUS, RESULT, METHOD, INPUT_DATE) VALUES (#ID#, #CLIENT_ID#, #JENIS_ID#, #PROCESS_API#, #PROCESS_DESC#, #HTTP_STATUS#, #RESULT#, #METHOD#, #INPUT_DATE#)
